english: Most or all of the economy should be nationalized
Capitalism should fundamentally be replaced
The government should run the healthcare insurance industry
The market will always make the best product unless the government intervenes
Excessive government intervention hurts the economy
Gay marriage should be illegal
We should have a national religion
Premarital sex should be illegal
Religious values should be taught in all schools
The media is biased against traditional values
There are only 2 genders
Murder and theft should be illegal
The government should require people to eat healthy
Genetic modification research should be legal on humans
The government would be best if the people directly voted on most issues
The government must be by the people for the people
Popular opinion is not always right
The government occasionally needs to do things which aren't popular for the good of its people
Society could not function without leaders and followers
A nation should obey its leadership without question
The government should not tolerate dissenting opinions
People should question the actions of those in power
